casebody.data:
477 A.2d 273 ATTORNEY GRIEVANCE COMMISSION OF MARYLAND v. Paul David GAYLE. Misc. (Subtitle BV) No. 2,

Sept. Term, 1983.

Court of Appeals of Maryland. June 29, 1984.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the consent to disbarment filed by Paul David Gayle in accordance with Maryland Rule BV12 d 2, and the written recommendation of Bar Counsel, it is this 29th day of June, 1984,

ORDERED, by the Court of Appeals of Maryland, that Paul David Gayle be, and he is hereby, disbarred by consent from the further practice of law in the State of Maryland; and it is further

ORDERED that the Clerk of this Court shall strike the name of Paul David Gayle from the register of attorneys, and pursuant to Maryland Rule BV13, shall certify that fact to the Trustees of the Clients’ Security Trust Fund and the clerks of all judicial tribunals in the State.
